title: Keryu responded to my ticket!
body:
They answered yesterday and so my bad for not checking sooner :v

Previous thread: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/Xn4Zc2MZ-this-was-the-message-i-just-sent-keryu-regarding-recent-oce-boarde-moderation

---

Here was their response:
>Hey Colonel J,

>Each region is in control of the way their Boards are run and I am sorry to hear about the experiences on the OCE Boards. I have went ahead and forwarded this over to their team to look into. From what I see, this looks to have been proper actions and the script has been stopped in use.

>Best Regards,
>Keyru
>Player Behavior Specialist

http://i.imgur.com/66R8GCB.png

Another case closed from the teamwork of Keryu and myself.

No need to thank me. I'm only doing my job as The Sheriff.

What would you guys do without me?
